pattern.name: Open Source
pattern.problem: A software lacks functionality or can not be used anymore since the technical environment changed.
pattern.solution: Make available the source code to enable the user to extend or repair the software. This requires that the user has the technical skills and know-how to change the software as well as a suitable build environment.

evidence.rationale: Implementation of this "pattern" might raise sustainability awareness (see related pattern).

literature.bibliomixed: Busch, T. (2008): Open Source und Nachhaltigkeit. Open Source Jahrbuch 2008, TU Berlin.
